## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/materializationunit">MaterializationUnit</a> that materializes modules by calling the &#39;emit&#39; method on the given <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/irlayer">IRLayer</a>.
